```{r}
browser = read.csv("../examples/web-browsers.csv")
```

```{r}
nrow(browser)
mean(browser$spend)
var(browser$spend)/nrow(browser)
sd(browser$spend)/sqrt(nrow(browser)) # This isn't a pure sample standard deviation calculation but rather it is the standard error calculation
```

```{r}
B <- 1000
mub <- c()
for (b in 1:B){
	samp_b = sample.int(nrow(browser), replace=TRUE)
	mub <- c(mub, mean(browser$spend[samp_b])
	         
	         )
}

sd(mub)


summary( glm( log(spend) ~ broadband + anychildren, data=browser) )


xbar <- mean(browser$spend)
sig2 <- var(browser$spend)

B <- 10000
mub <- c()
for (b in 1:B){
  xsamp <- rnorm(1e4, xbar, sqrt(sig2))
  mub <- c(mub, mean(xsamp))
  }

sd(mub)

xbar
sqrt(sig2)

1e4
```
